title: RegisterClient (Method)
text:
METHOD RegisterClient : UDINT
Registers an instance IAlarmManagerClient at the alarm mannager.
The return value indicates, whether registering was successful

rows:
This parameter specifies, whether the client will also be used to
access the alarm history (will be able if both the parameters parritfAlarmsFromHistory
and iCountAlarmsFromHistory are <> 0).
This parameter also indicates the maximum numbers of rows of the alarm
history, that will be returned to the client by a call to method
GetAlarmsFromStorage.
The effective size of the array above
